#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(i, a, b) for(int i = (a), _b = (b); i <= _b; ++i)
#define FORD(i, a, b) for(int i = (a), _b = (b); i >= _b; --i)
#define REP(i, a) for (int i = 0, _a = (a); i < _a; ++i)
#define REPD(i, a) for (int i = (a) - 1; i >= 0; --i)
#define sqr(x) ((x) * (x))
#define SZ(x) ((int)x.size())
#define pb push_back
#define setbit(x, n) (x ^ (1 << n)) //n-th bit become 0 if 1, and 1 if 0
#define checkbit(x, n) (x & (1 << n)) //check if n-th bit is 1
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef pair<int, int> ii;

int n, m, f[1005][1005];

void Init() {
	FOR(i, 1, 300) f[1][i] = i;
	FOR(i, 2, 300) FOR(j, 1, 300) {
		f[i][j] = 1e9+7;
		FOR(k, 1, j) f[i][j] = min(f[i][j], max(f[i - 1][k - 1], f[i - 1][j - k]) + 1);
	}
}

int main() {
	Init();
	int t; scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--) {
		scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
		printf("%d\n", f[m][n]+m);
	}
    return 0;
}
